page.title: ccother
page.t: A multi-purpose destroyer of DSS, equipped with advanced electromagnetic railguns, point defense arrays, and a universal vertical missile launch system, capable of adapting to the needs of most combat missions.
A nuclear fusion thruster that uses a stellarator magnetic field structure and superconducting coils to confine plasma, converting neutron kinetic energy.
A plasma field generator that forms a high-density ion barrier based on magnetic confinement plasma technology.
A shipborne dual-rail railgun composed of a segmented coil array and adaptive current control.
An electromagnetically driven six-barrel rapid-fire Gatling gun, using nanofluid circulation cooling, capable of supporting long-term combat needs.
A modular missile silo system capable of using multiple types of missiles.
A universal missile of DSS, suitable for both anti-air and anti-ship operations.
